emifEccErrInfo Struct Reference
IP » EMIFEMIF4F » | EMIF4F Data Structures

Structure holding error information of EMIF. More...

#include <csl_emif4f.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t errBitLoc
 
uint32_t errCnt
 
uint32_t numValidErrAddr
 
uint32_t errAddr [EMIF_ECC_FIFO_BUF_SIZE]
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding error information of EMIF.

Field Documentation

uint32_t emifEccErrInfo::errAddr

Address offset of EMIF when 1 bit or 2 bit or non-quanta ECC error Occurs.

uint32_t emifEccErrInfo::errBitLoc

Error Bit location of EMIF when 1 Bit Error occurs Valid only for 1 bit Error

uint32_t emifEccErrInfo::errCnt

As per hardware, it represent Error count for 1 Bit Errors. ErrCnt could be more than ECC_EMIF_FIFO_BUF_SIZE in case of overflow. And user can check overflow if this count is greater that numValidErrAddr

uint32_t emifEccErrInfo::numValidErrAddr

Number of Valid ECC Error Address
